message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY, cs.MA 

This paper is about a modular robot system that can autonomously complete high-level tasks by reactively reconfiguring to meet the needs of a perceived, a priori unknown environment. The system integrates perception, high-level planning, and modular hardware, which are all relevant to the field of robotics (cs.RO). Additionally, the system uses artificial intelligence (cs.AI) to make decisions about when and how to reconfigure, and computer vision (cs.CV) to perceive the environment. The system also involves control systems (cs.SY) to balance distributed mechanical elements with centralized perception, planning, and control. Finally, the system uses optimization techniques (cs.MA) to manipulate objects to complete its task.
